Nebula.name: Nebula
Nebula.description: A beautiful theme made for Zen Browser :))

natsumi-browser.name: Natsumi Browser
natsumi-browser.description: A skin for Firefox and its forks that makes things flow.

ai-tabgroups-zenbrowser.name: Tidy Tabs
ai-tabgroups-zenbrowser.description: The script sorts the temporary tabs into tabgroups using ai for a more cleaner organized browsing experience. Inspired by Arc Max Tidy feature.

zaps-cool-photon-theme.name: zap's cool photon theme
zaps-cool-photon-theme.description: a cool photon theme for firefox-based browsers [but NOT zen >:(]

Neo-Zen.name: Neo Zen
Neo-Zen.description: A sleek, futuristic theme for Zen Browser that blends modern design with mindful simplicity

zen-command-palette.name: Zen Command Palette
zen-command-palette.description: A powerful, extensible command interface for Zen Browser, seamlessly integrated into the URL bar. Inspired by Raycast and Arc.

browse-bot.name: Browse Bot
browse-bot.description: Transforms the standard Zen Browser findbar into a modern, floating, AI-powered chat interface. Inspired by Arc Browser.

floating-sidebar.name: Floating Sidebar
floating-sidebar.description: Lightweight script to, make firefox Sidebar Floating also option to pin/unpin the sidebar.

search-engine-select.name: Search Engine Select
search-engine-select.description: Adds a floating UI to switch search engines on a search results page.

settings-shortcuts-search.name: Search Keyboard shortcuts
settings-shortcuts-search.description: Lightweight script to add search and filter options in keyboard shortcuts in settings

ad97bb70-0066-4e42-9b5f-173a5e42c6fc.name: SuperPins
ad97bb70-0066-4e42-9b5f-173a5e42c6fc.description: This Zen Mod enhances pinned tabs/Essentials, by making some UI/UX changes.

quick-search-zen-browser.name: Quick Search
quick-search-zen-browser.description: This is a quick search script for zen browser. Allows an user to quickly search a query in a small pop up container thus removing the need to swtich to a whole different tab

context-menu-icons.name: Context Menu Icons
context-menu-icons.description: Improve the context menu by adding icons, fold menu items and more.

wireframe-2.0.name: Wireframe 2.0
wireframe-2.0.description: A minimal theme for Zen. Unconventional by design.

vizen-floaty-ui.name: Floaty UI
vizen-floaty-ui.description: Compact Mode, but it floats. Supports Zen Color Picker and background blur.

quick-tabs.name: Quick Tabs
quick-tabs.description: A Quick and easy way to browse tabs without leaving focus of whats important.

zen-tidy-downloads.name: Tidy Downloads
zen-tidy-downloads.description: Clean up your downloads with AI

customize-collapsed-sidebar.name: Customize Collapsed Sidebar
customize-collapsed-sidebar.description: Allows you to customize your collapsed sidebar to its fullest potential!

zen-tidy-tabs.name: Zen Tidy Tabs
zen-tidy-tabs.description: Sort your tabs using Firefox's local AI but make it look awesome!

No-Gaps.name: No-Gaps
No-Gaps.description: There will be no gaps in the sides to have a sleek look for every layout

c9ee0d97-d2d6-40fd-8f85-549fe000b868.name: Deta Loading Bar
c9ee0d97-d2d6-40fd-8f85-549fe000b868.description: A sleek animated loading bar that appears at the top of the page during loading, similar to Deta Surf browser. Features customizable colors, gradient effects, blur animation, adjustable thickness, and optional box shadows. Integrates with Zen Browser's theme colors or use custom colors and width.

reopen-closed-tabs.name: Reopen Closed Tabs Menu
reopen-closed-tabs.description: A popup menu to view and restore recently closed tabs. Includes a toolbar button and keyboard shortcut.

paneru.name: Paneru
paneru.description: A comprehensive theme that separates various elements onto their own panel, respects Firefox theme colors, and supports transparency.

zen-drop-link.name: Zen Drop Link to Split
zen-drop-link.description: This mod allows you to split tabs by drag and drop links

tab-rename-zen-browser.name: Better Tab Rename
tab-rename-zen-browser.description: Adds a right click menu option to rename tabs (instead of the present double click one so that you dont have to load the tab anymore). Also adds non-pinned tabs renaming functionality

zen-live-calendar.name: Live Calendar
zen-live-calendar.description: Brings the live calendar functionality from Arc to Zen, making it feel as native as possible.

cfafe94c-5a29-4dae-8489-6be514185474.name: Better Sidebar
cfafe94c-5a29-4dae-8489-6be514185474.description: Enhance default firefox sidebar with a modern look and feel matching Zen UI.

3c8ebf69-1042-49b1-8f08-9178f9490659.name: Better Music Bar
3c8ebf69-1042-49b1-8f08-9178f9490659.description: Make your zen music bar better.

42b8c4ac-76d5-4521-9917-2e478931ee53.name: Zen Compact Transparent Mode
42b8c4ac-76d5-4521-9917-2e478931ee53.description: Make popups UI menu transparent with custom settings.

bada16c1-3b14-483b.name: Better New Tab button
bada16c1-3b14-483b.description: A Zen Browser mod that enhances the New Tab button experience

f966100a-4fed-4df5-a082-f001c5bd654e.name: Tidy Popup & Extension
f966100a-4fed-4df5-a082-f001c5bd654e.description: Cleans up popup panels & extensions with optional dividers, compact buttons, and customizable hover colors. Supports using Zen Browserâ€™s primary color or manual light/dark hover colors with conditional preferences.

3699917d-0238-422a-bb4b-9d37344c0c5f.name: Custom Swipe Animation & Color
3699917d-0238-422a-bb4b-9d37344c0c5f.description: Customizable trackpad swipe transitions and the colors for the swipe UI.

IconTweaker.name: Icon Tweaker
IconTweaker.description: Tab icon resizer for Essentials, Pinned, Normal and Workspaces.
